text: Manipur Polo International 2016 or 10th Manipur International Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. Australia won the trophy after defeating India-B team (Manipur team) by 7-6 goals. USA won the third place by beating England by 7-6 goals. == Participants == * * * * * * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2016 in sports Category:2010s in Indian sport
title: Manipur Polo International 2016
